name: Micro City Golf - for the iPad
name_original: Micro City Golf - for the iPad
description:
The ultimate mini golf game for the iPad

Welcome to the latest addition to the Micro City range, on our app you can play an amazing games of mini golf, set in our Micro City town.

Amazing 3D
18 Holes to play
Realistic 3D graphics
Multiplayer
and more...
